dict.acceptation: 最后，最终；基本上；根本；郅；

sent.orig: Ultimately it will lead to a powerful international learning network in this important field.
sent.trans: 在此重要领域中，它最终将形成国际上强大的学习网络。

sent.orig: But ultimately get the proceeds in cash.
sent.trans: 但最终获得的收益以现金支付。

sent.orig: But ultimately Ghana lost to Uruguay.
sent.trans: 但最终，加纳输给了乌拉圭。

sent.orig: Every value he created ultimately redounded to his boss.
sent.trans: 他创造的价值最后全进了他老板的腰包。

sent.orig: It's not concerned for any of its forms ultimately.
sent.trans: 基本上它不关心任何的形体。
